actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend section 521(a) (1) of the Housing Act of 1949 for the purpose of changing the time period when the Secretary of the Treasury adjusts the interest rate to a level below which the Secretary of Agriculture may not charge on loans made under such section.

summary.text: Revises under the Housing Act the period of time to 60 days when the Secretary of the Treasury adjusts the interest rate to a level below which the Secretary of Agriculture may not charge on loans made under the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 521(a) (1) of the Housing Act of 1949 for the purpose of changing the time period when the Secretary of the Treasury adjusts the interest rate to a level below which the Secretary of Agriculture may not charge on loans made under such section.
